app_descript:
Mobile Passport Control

Brief: Mobile Passport Control is an official app by U.S. Customs and Border Protection that modernizes the entry process into the United States, offering a more efficient and secure way to cross the border. The app enables eligible travelers to submit their passport information and customs declaration form through a mobile device, thus reducing wait times at the airport upon arrival.

Core Features:
